Mosi-oa-Tunya (English: The Smoke Which Thunders) bụ mkpụrụ ego ọla edo e webatara na Obodo  Zimbabwe na afo 2022 n'ihe gbasara ịrị elu nke ọnụ ahịa.
Mosi-oa-Tunya bụ aha Tongan maka Victoria Falls ma tụgharịa ya n'asụsụ Bekee dịka The Smoke Which Thunders
Mkpụrụ ego ndị ahụ dị otu troy ounce ma jiri ọlaedo carat iri abuo na abuo mee ha. A na-emepụta ha na mpụga obodo Zimbabwe.
Mkpụrụ ego igwe ọ bụla nwere nọmba serial pụrụ iche.
Reserve Bank nke obodo Zimbabwe kesara  Mosi-oa-Tunya puku abuo na ụlọ akụ azụmahịa na oge 25 Juun n’afo 2022
Enwere ike iji ha mee ihe maka ebumnuche ịzụ ahịa nkịtị. E webatara mkpụrụ ego ndị ahụ n'oge ọgba aghara na ego obodo dị ugbu a na omume ndị Zimbabwe iji dollar US.
Mkpụrụ ego ndị ahụ ruru ọnụego ahịa mba ụwa maka otu troy ounce nke ọlaedo, gbakwunyere pasent ise.
